features.featureDescription: Many health care facilities deliver meals to patients on demand, while others prepare meals in large batches to be distributed at one time. Whether meals are individually prepared or created in large quantities, each cook is responsible for a certain aspect of the process.

The Custom Cooking System allows survivors to create their own consumable items with custom names and ingredients to provide different effects. Place the finished recipe into a Cooking Pot or Industrial Cooker with the required ingredients and light the fire to begin the cooking process.
